author: craigmcc
msg: Add support for configuring application event listeners as required by
Servlet 2.3 PD1.  The events are not actually called yet, until the new
API classes are used and missing methods resolved -- that will be next.
In addition, create an unofficial version of the 2.3 "web.dtd" file for
use until the official one becomes available.

author: horwat
msg: webapps examples files

author: craigmcc
msg: In the getSession() method, just return null (instead of throwing a
NullPointerException) if no Manager has been configured -- which means
that sessions are not being supported in this instance of Catalina.
Reported by: Vivek Nagar <Vivek.Nagar@eng.sun.com>

author: craigmcc
msg: Clean up the former special handling of getContext("/") calls.  Now,
requests for this are treated like anything else (and will return the root
context).
Add a new Context property (crossContext) that allows the administrator
to turn on and off, on a per-app basis, the ability for getContext() to
cross application boundaries.  Defaults to "true" to keep Watchdog happy.
The Tomcat 4.0 version of Catalina passes all the Watchdog servlet tests
except for the getContext() one, but that is only because the ROOT context
is not currently configured in $CATALINA_HOME/webapps.  That will be fixed
soon.

author: craigmcc
msg: Fix "minor script issues" in catalina.sh corresponding to changes in
catalina.bat.
